name: Phirew0rk
description:
This is a small game we made for Mini Jam 44: New Year!  As you might guess the game is New Years themed, as you play as a firework trying to get as high as possible.  Can you see all the things that await you in space?

A limitation set by the jam was that you may only use 3 inputs.  Those are left, right, and up (or W, A, D depending on your preference).  Intuitively, they tilt and speed up.  Nothing complicated here.

Game made in Unity.  All code done by Clanga, and all graphics done by Sanqui.
